title: Drawing, "Screen Design: Leaf Pattern", 1928–33
medium: Brush and green, red, yellow, brown and black gouache, graphite on off-white illustration board, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Small stamp in red ink at lower left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY; at upper right (inverted): DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY; printed label on verso: ILLUS/AMERIC
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower left: -1025-
description: Design for a folding screen with overlapping abstract leaves.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design: Leaf Pattern", 1928–33.
1928–33. Brush and green, red, yellow, brown and black gouache, graphite on off-white illustration board, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-164.
